Label: Charity Organisation
Description: An organization that supports a cause by fundraising or through donations and charity

Label: Data Reuse Competent Body
Description: An entity designated by a public sector body to provide legal and technical support on the access and reuse of public sector data

Label: Data Altruism Organisation
Description: An non-profit organisation whom collects and shares data for altruistic purposes

Label: Data Cooperative
Description: An entity constituted by data subjects, one-person undertakings or SMEs who provides data intermediation services and supports its members in the exercise of their data-related rights

Label: Data Holder
Description: An entity who has the right to grant access to or to share certain personal data or non-personal data

Label: Data Intermediation Authority
Description: An authority tasked with overseeing the activity of data intermediation service providers and maintaining a public register of said entities

Label: Data Intermediation Service Provider
Description: An entity who establishes commercial relationships for the data sharing between data subjects and data holders on the one hand and data users on the other

Label: Data Intermediation Service Provider for Data Holder
Description: An entity who makes data holders' data available for potential data users, including bilateral or multilateral exchanges of data and platforms and databases for the joint exploitation of data

Label: Data Intermediation Service Provider for Data Subject
Description: An entity who makes data subjects' personal data available for potential data users

Label: Data User
Description: An entity who has access an the right to use personal or non-personal data for commercial or non-commercial purposes

Label: European Data Innovation Board
Description: An authority tasked with overseeing the activities of data intermediation service providers and data altruism organisations

Label: Private Sector Body
Description: Private Sector Body

Label: Public Sector Body
Description: An entity or association of entities governed by public law formed by one or more State, regional or local authorities

Label: Single Information Point Provider
Description: An entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data

Label: EU Single Information Point Provider
Description: An entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data in the EU

Label: Local Single Information Point Provider
Description: A local entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data

Label: National Single Information Point Provider
Description: A national entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data

Label: Regional Single Information Point Provider
Description: A regional entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data

Label: Sectorial Single Information Point Provider
Description: An entity who is responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data for a particular sector

Label: Small or Medium Enterprise
Description: Organisations with a low number of employees

Label: Startup
Description: Newly established organisation

Label: Data Altruism Authority
Description: An authority tasked with overseeing the activity of data altruism organisations and maintaining a public register of said entities

Label: Commercially Confidential Data
Description: Data protected through Commercial Confidentiality Agreements

Label: Confidential Data
Description: Confidential Data

Label: Intellectual Property
Description: Data protected through Intellectual Property

Label: Sensitive Data
Description: Sensitive Data

Label: Sensitive Non-personal Data
Description: Sensitive Non-personal Data

Label: Statistically Confidential Data
Description: Data protected through Statistical Confidentiality Agreements

Label: Data Altruism
Description: Purposes associated with the voluntary sharing of data for the general interest of the public, such as healthcare or combating climate change
Comment: Data Altruism as a purpose should be combined with other purposes to indicate their altruistic interpretation or application. E.g. improving healthcare and data altruism in combination.

Label: Combat Climate Change
Description: Purposes associated with combating the causes and consequences of climate change, including reducing gas emissions and fighting emergencies such as floods or wildfires

Label: Improve Healthcare
Description: Purposes associated with improving the public healthcare systems across the Member States, including improving personalised treatments and helping cure chronic diseases

Label: Improve Public Services
Description: Purposes associated with improving the provision of public services, such as public safety, education or law enforcement

Label: Improve Transport and Mobility
Description: Purposes associated with improving traffic, public transport systems or costs for drivers

Label: Protection of Intellectual Property Rights
Description: Purposes associated with the protection of intellectual property rights

Label: Protection of National Security
Description: Purposes associated with the protection of national security

Label: Protection of Public Security
Description: Purposes associated with the protection of public security

Label: Provide Official Statistics
Description: Purposes associated with facilitating the development, production and dissemination of reliable official statistics

Label: Public Policy Making
Description: Purposes associated with public policy making, such as the development of new laws

Label: Scientific  Research
Description: Purposes associated with scientific research

Label: Commercial Purpose
Description: Purposes associated with processing activities performed in a commercial setting or with intention to commercialise

Label: Non-commercial Purpose
Description: Purposes associated with processing activities performed in a non-commercial setting or without intention to commercialise

Label: Enhance Data Interoperability
Description: Enhance the interoperability of the data

Label: Ensure Data Harmonisation with Standards
Description: Enhance harmonisation of data with standards

Label: Exchange Views on Data Processing
Description: Supporting inviduals and entities in exchanging views on data processing purposes and relevant information

Label: Facilitate Data Exchange
Description: Facilitate exchange of data

Label: Misuse, Prevention and Detection
Description: Prevention and Detection of Misuse or Abuse of services

Label: Negotiate Contractual Agreements
Description: Negotiate contractual agreements regarding processing of data and other matters, including terms and conditions

Label: Support Making Choices for Informed Choices
Description: Supporting individuals in understanding and making choices with respect to informed consent

Label: Art 5(12) Adequacy Decision
Description: Adequacy Decision

Label: Art 12(e) Data Exchange Approval
Description: Explicit request or approval of the data subject or data holder to utilise additional specific tools for the purposes of facilitating exchange of data

Label: Art 31(2) Data Transfer International Agreement
Description: Data Transfer International Agreement

Label: Art 31(3) Data Transfer Third Country Judgement
Description: Data Transfer Third Country Judgement

Label: Art 5(11) Model Contractual Clauses
Description: Model Contractual Clauses

Label: Art 2(6) Permission
Description: The legal basis justfiying processing of non-personal data based on the permission of an entity

Label: Art 5(9) Permission for Transfer
Description: The legal basis justfiying processing of non-personal data based on the permission of an entity to transfer data

Label: Aggregate
Description: Join data from multiple sources

Label: Display
Description: Show data in an organised way so that it can be seen by the public

Label: Download
Description: Copy and receive data from one computer system to another over a network, e.g., over the internet

Label: Export
Description: Provide a copy of data from one system to another

Label: Reuse
Description: Use of data with a subsequent context i.e. different from its initial context
Comment: Difference in context can be for means, purpose, legal basis, etc.

Label: Convert Format
Description: Convert data from one format to another

Label: Commercial Confidentiality Agreement
Description: Agreements that enforce commercial confidentiality including business, professional and company secrets

Label: Commonly Used Open Standard
Description: Commonly used and openly accessible standard

Label: Commonly Used Standard
Description: Commonly used standard

Label: Open Standard
Description: Openly accessible standard

Label: International Standard
Description: Internationally recognised standard

Label: Standard
Description: Standard

Label: Consent Management
Description: Methods to obtain and withdraw consent or permission to process data

Label: Data Subject Rights Management
Description: Methods to facilitate the exercising of data subjects' rights

Label: Permission Management
Description: Methods to obtain and withdraw consent or permission to process data

Label: Intellectual Property Rights Management
Description: Management of Intellectual Property Rights with a view to identify and safeguard and enforce them

Label: Consent Management Tool
Description: Technical tools to manage consent

Label: European Data Altruism Consent Form
Description: A form provided by the European Commission for collecting consent

Label: Data Altruism Annual Activity Report
Description: Document containing the annual activities reported by a Data Altruism organisation

Label: Register of Data Altruism Activity
Description: Document that logs the activity of the data altruism organisation

Label: Register of Data Intermediation Activity
Description: Document that logs the activity of the data intermediation service provider

Label: Data Altruism Notice
Description: Notice providing information regarding the processing of data for data altruistic purposes

Label: Data Asset List
Description: Searchable asset list which contains available data resources including their data format and size and the conditions for theirÂ re-use

Label: Data Breach Notification
Description: Notification information a data breach or unauthorised transfer, access, use, or modification of data

Label: Data Exchange Method
Description: Methods to facilitate the exchange of data

Label: Data Intermediation Service Notification
Description: Notification by a Data Intermediation Service Provider to a competent authority concerning changes to details regarding its Data Intermediation Service

Label: National Data Altruism Policy
Description: A Policy established at National level regarding Data Altruism

Label: Data Reuse Policy
Description: A Policy to govern data re-use

Label: Data Reuse Request Procedure
Description: Procedure to request data for reuse via single information point

Label: Data Transfer Notice
Description: Notice for the legal entity for the transfer of its data

Label: Enforce Transfer Control
Description: Purposes associated with conducting or enforcing transfer control so as to limit the transfer of data

Label: Legal Measure
Description: Legally-recognised agreements, e.g., contracts

Label: Licence
Description: Document which states the conditions for usage of data

Label: Permission Management Tool
Description: Technical tools to manage permissions

Label: Personal Data Reuse Notice
Description: Notice for data subjects to provide consent based on information and advise regarding intended use of data, exercise of rights, and applicable terms and conditions

Label: Third Country Data Request Notice
Description: Notice regarding a data request for the transfer of data to a third country recipient

Label: Statistical Confidentiality Agreement
Description: Agreements that enforce statistical confidentiality

Label: Compensation
Description: Compensation

Label: Reward
Description: Reward

Label: Risk of Re-identification
Description: Risk of Re-identification

Label: Data Intermediation Technology
Description: Technology related to the provision of data intermediation services

Label: Secure Processing Environment
Description: Physical or virtual environment to ensure compliance with EU law

Label: Technology Designer
Description: Actor that designsTechnology

Label: Technology Installer
Description: Actor that installs Technology

Label: Technology Maintainer
Description: Actor that maintains Technology

Label: Technology Manufacturer
Description: Actor that manufactures Technology

Label: Technology Owner
Description: Actor that owns Technology

Label: Technology Purchaser
Description: Actor that purchases Technology

Label: Technology Supplier
Description: Actor that supplies Technology

Label: Right to Data Conversion Opt-out
Description: Right of data subjects and data holders to opt-out of data conversions e.g. enhance interoperability or harmonisation with standards

Label: Right to Impartial Body Review
Description: Right of data subjects and data holders to get an review by an impartial body with the appropriate expertise

Label: Right to Lodge Complaint
Description: Right of data subjects and data holders to lodge a complaint

Label: Single Information Point
Description: Service responsible for receiving and transmiting requests for the re-use of public data

Label: Data Intermediation Service
Description: Service of data intermediation which aims to facilitate the sharing of data between Data Subjects, Data Holders and Data Users

Label: Data Cooperative Service
Description: Service provided by a data cooperative

Label: Data Intermediation Service between Data Holders and Data Users
Description: Data intermediation service for data shared between Data Holders and Data Users

Label: Data Intermediation Service between Data Subjects and Data Users
Description: Data intermediation service for data shared between Data Subjects, Natural Persons who are Data Holders and Data Users

Label: Data Reuse Request
Description: Request for re-use some data

Label: EU Approval for Data Intermediation Service Provider
Description: Confirmation and approval by a competent authority for the Data Intermediation Service Provider's compliance with Article 11 and Article 12 of the DGA

Label: Public Register
Description: A register containing information which is made publicly available

Label: EU's Public Register of Data Altruism Organisations
Description: Registry maintained by EU containing list of recognised data altruism organisations

Label: National Public Register of Data Altruism Organisations
Description: Registry maintained at National level containing list of recognised data altruism organisations

Label: Public Register of Data Altruism Organisations
Description: Registry containing list of recognised data altruism organisations

Label: Public Register of Data Intermediation Service Providers
Description: Document that contains a publicly available list of data intermediation service providers

Label: Public Register of Entities
Description: Document that contains a publicly available list of entities that perform a certain activity within a certain location or jurisdiction

Label: Fees
Description: Fee charged by an entity to provide a service
